hyperparameters.name: n_estimators
hyperparameters.short_desc: The number of trees in the forest.

hyperparameters.name: max_depth
hyperparameters.short_desc: The maximum depth of the tree.

hyperparameters.name: min_samples_split
hyperparameters.short_desc: The minimum number of samples required to split an internal node.

hyperparameters.name: min_samples_leaf
hyperparameters.short_desc: The minimum number of samples required to be at a leaf node.

hyperparameters.name: max_features
hyperparameters.short_desc: The number of features to consider when looking for the best split.

hyperparameters.name: min_impurity_decrease
hyperparameters.short_desc: A node will be split if this split induces a decrease of the impurity greater than or equal to this value.
